attributes.action: publish every month a list of e-Petitions that it have both accepted and rejected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed that every e-petition I have signed has been rejected, thereby leading me to suspect that all are rejected and that the e-Petition website is a mere public relations con-trick that attempts to fool people into thinking they are communicating with a listening government. Therefore, the publication of a full monthly list will allow people to monitor the effectiveness of the E-Petition website.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
